thought: To solve this task I need to craft 1 polished_blackstone_brick_wall. Polished_blackstone_brick_wall requires placing 6 polished_blackstone_bricks in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the polished_blackstone_bricks from slot 10 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
